sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react" import {minutesToDuration} from "./utils/duration" export default function Controls({focus, breakTime, setFocus, setBreak, setCountdown, disableControls}) { const focusDecrease = () => { setFocus((prevTime) => Math.max(5, prevTime - 5)) setCountdown((prevTime) => Math.max(300, prevTime - 5 * 60)) } const focusIncrease = () => { setFocus((prevTime) => Math.min(60, prevTime + 5)) setCountdown((prevTime) => Math.min(3600, prevTime + 5 * 60)) } const breakTimeDecrease = () => { setBreak((prevTime) => Math.max(1, prevTime - 1)) } const breakTimeIncrease = () => { setBreak((prevTime) => Math.min(15, prevTime + 1)) } return(
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focus)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
) }
